import React from "react"; import {Button, Container} from "@material-ui/core"; import {Field} from "formik"; import {TextField} from "formik-material-ui"; const Step2 = (props) => { var disabled = true; console.log(props.errors); if (props.currentStep !== 2) return null; if ( props.values.firstName && props.values.lastName && props.values.email && props.values.address && !props.errors.entries ) disabled = false; return (
); }; export default Step2;
